content: HAC-V-T EDGE C Top-of-slab rebar channel for corners Serrated cast-in anchor channels in custom sizes and lengths for top-of-slab installations catering to 3D loads ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchor channels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Increased design freedom – solution for designs, where standard HAC anchor channel reaches application limits Higher shear load resistance due to confinement of concrete edge Suitable for small edge distances and thin concrete slabs Available for different edge distances, already set for quicker installation Upgraded performance – tension resistance up to 20% higher than previous HAC anchor channels Applications Installing curtain wall brackets on anchor channels in top-of-slab position, especially in building corners Fastening to thin concrete slabs Seismic-relevant applications and 3D loads ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized Channel profile: HAC-V-T 50 EDGE C PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized | Channel profile | HAC-V-T 50 EDGE C | PROFIS Software | Yes | Product type | Anchor channel ### ITEMS- 2366652 -
